name: Entity
description: An Entity provides additional context about an item in a UDM event.

children.name: metadata
children.description: Entity metadata such as timestamp, product, etc.

children.name: entity
children.description: Noun in the UDM event that this entity represents.

children.name: risk_score
children.description: Stores information related to the entity's risk score.

children.name: metric
children.description: Stores statistical metrics about the entity.

children.name: relations
children.description: One or more relationships between the entity and other entities.
